title: I have payed my chargeback fee's but I'm still not unbanned
body:
Why have I not been unbanned yet, I have payed my chargeback and it has been nearly 2 days and I have still not been unbanned???
Someone please help me!!!

replies.body: It often takes a bit (from a few hours to a few days) to completely process a chargeback payback. If your account isn't active within 5 days, please reach out to me, I'll double check on the status of your request.
Thank you so much and I shall find a way on reaching you if my account has not been activated by the 15th of January.
